attributes.action: include all childcare provisions in the second lockdown to prevent COVID-19.
attributes.additional_details: As the vulnerable are being forced to take their children onto a school site when they’re at a greater risk of being infected, yet can’t prevent it due to medical conditions. also if children are carriers of the virus then they are more likely to spread it without knowing, putting us into a lockdown and keeping universities (which are people from several different regions/countries), schools and other childcare settings is defeating the point of a lockdown.
attributes.background: consider including childcare provisions in the lockdown to prevent the mixing of families and children, as even carriers will spread it without knowing. we should consider the well-being of children and those that are vulnerable, having to access the school site to send their children.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

Since you started your petition, the national lockdown has ended. You could start a new petition calling for changes to the current tiered restrictions, if that's what you'd like to see happen.
